糾.definition: to gather together; to investigate; to entangle; to correct

糾察.definition: to maintain order; steward (policing a meeting)

糾彈.definition: to censure; to denounce; to impeach

糾眾.definition: to muster; to gather a crowd

糾結.definition: to intertwine; to band together (with); to link up (with); twisted; tangled; confused; to be at a loss; to struggle (mentally) with (sth); to overthink; to feel conflicted

糾纏.definition: to be in a tangle; to nag
